item.title: Highcharts tips
item.description: xAxis.dateTimeLabelFormats https://api.highcharts.com/highcharts/xAxis.dateTimeLabelFormats { millisecond: '%H:%M:%S.%L', second: '%H:%M:%S', minute: '%H:%M', hour: '%H:%M', day: '%e. %b', week: '%e. %b', month: '%b \'%y', year: '%Y' } Remove all series while(chart.series.length > 0) { chart.
